  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15600</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Fiumi in Europa</string>
            <string language="en">Rivers in Erope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flüsse in Erope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fleuves dans Erope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rios em Erope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποταμοί σε Erope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ríos en Erope</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo LO riguarda i fiumi europei. Verifica la conoscenza dei nomi dei fiumi.</string>
            <string language="en">This is an LO about the European rivers. It examines the knowledge about the names of the rivers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">fiumi</string>
            <string language="en">rivers</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist über die europäischen Flüsse ein 
NIEDRIGES. Es überprüft das Wissen über die Namen der 
Flüsse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un BAS au sujet des fleuves européens. 
Il examine la connaissance au sujet des noms des fleuves.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um BAIXO sobre os rios europeus. 
Examina o conhecimento sobre os nomes dos rios.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα LO για τους ευρωπαϊκούς ποταμούς. 
Εξετάζει τη γνώση για τα ονόματα των ποταμών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es un BAJO sobre los ríos europeos. 
Examina el conocimiento sobre los nombres de los ríos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flüsse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fleuves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rios</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ποταμοί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ríos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <description>
            <string language="it">Possiamo usare questo LO per verificare la conoscenza degli alunni riguardo i nomi dei fiumi in Europa. E' un esercizio di collegamento. I nomi dei fiumi devono essere scelti in base alle figure.</string>
            <string language="en">We can use this LO to check learners knowledge about the names of the rivers in Europe. It's a matching exercise. Names of the rivers have to be chosen for the pictures of them.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
